attributes.action: Allow the expansion of UK airports to sustain growth
attributes.additional_details:
Allow expansion of airports in the UK to allow for growth and make this country become a strong competitor for trade and business like it once was.

Heathrow, Manchester, whichever. These airports need to be allowed to expand to allow the UK expand to the world. This country is going to fall behind in the next few decades if planning regulations and green peace lunatics disallow this. Build new runways and terminals.

Aviation accounts for 2% of global warming and these issues are far more important!
